title: "TidyTuesday1"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2025-08-05')
income_inequality_processed <- tuesdata$income_inequality_processed
income_inequality_raw <- tuesdata$income_inequality_raw

ggplot(data=income_inequality_processed, aes(x=Year, y=gini_mi_eq, color=Entity)) + geom_line() + labs(title="Inequality in countries across time", x="Year", y="Gini Index", color="Country")
```
